msg: Brian Millet reports this exit is also broken under _66/threads/solaris

author: dougm
msg: if APACHE_PREFIX=... is present, use it for:
- add apaci_install target for mod_perl's 'make install'

author: rse
msg: The =pod/=cut trick (like CPP's #if 0/#endif) is ok when no embedded real POD
document exists. But when one exists the "out-pod-ed" code sections occur in
the manual page.  A "perldoc Apache::Registry" showed these stuff :-(

author: rse
msg: Remove whitespace before POD command. POD utils don't like this,
they then don't recognize the following =xxxx command.
